name: HiruNewsFeed
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Hiru News is Sri Lanka's Number One News Portal. This skill allows you to listen to latest Hiru News updates. Add "Hiru News Feed" skill at the top of your Flash Briefing content provider list in Alexa app (Settings --> Flash Briefing). Then, simply say "Alexa, What is my Flash Briefing"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
